name: Tomato Toastman
short_description: Tomato USB is a fork of popular Tomato firmware (http://www.polarcloud.com/tomato) for Broadcom-based routers. This fork is further based on the TomatoUSB project. It adds improved QOS system, per-IP traffic monitoring and statistics, incoming class bandwidth chart, support for several new router models, and various enhancements. There is also an experimental branch with a VLAN setup GUI and Multi-SSID based on the work of, and in collaboration with, Augusto Bott (Teaman).
summary: Tomato USB is a fork of the popular Tomato router firmware
